string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "3 things I want in a relationship: Eyes that wont cry, lips than wont lie, and love that wont die."
"You don't have to like me, I'm not a Facebook status."
"Girls fall in love with what they hear. Boys fall in love with what they see. That's why girls wear make up; and boys lie."
"Taylor gang or die."
"Ballin's not a hobby, it's my occupation. Hoes on my d*ck, that's my confirmation."
"I dont love em, I dont chase em, I duck em."
"Good things come in good time."
"Any chick that I handle, I teach 'em patience. How not to win the award but be glad for your nomination."
"Tatted like a mexican, fresher than a freshman."
"If you don't smoke, I don't know why."
"While they talkin it I'm out here livin it."
"If I were a lame, only just for a week. Id look myself in the mirror and shoot the first thing I see."
"Let ya hair blow in the breeze roll some bomb ass weed."
"Don't care what your friends say, cause they dont know me. I can be your best friend, and you be my homie."
"It's Taylor Gang over everything."
"Being single doesn't necessarily mean you're available. Sometimes you have to put up a sign that says, \"Do Not Disturb\" on your heart."
"Tired of saying shit to make these niggas understand, so I'll be everything that you say I am."
"Aw man, still they hate and talk smack, Knowin if i was gone, theird be no thrown to throw your rocks at."
"Breakin down the weed about to make a plane, a hundred niggas wit me all reppin taylor gang."
"Yeah they talk but I can't hear what they say... cuz I'm flyin."
"People tellin me I changed, that's exactly what I'm gettin so I'll never be the same."
"Ni**as be pressed for pussy, it aint nothing Instead of worrying about who that bitch fuckin, why dont you get you some money."
"Now the hoes say I'm conceited cuz they wanna give me brain and I say I don't need it."
"Rolex, mo sex, good weed, no stress, run my town, arms, chest, lift weights, bowflex."
"No love for em nigga breaking hearts...no keys, push the start."
"No matter where I am, no matter where you are, I'll be there when its over baby. Cause I was there from the start."
"I talk money so I save breath."
"You show up to my concert looking like a fan, I pull up in the car service looking like the man."
"I fell asleep on a plane and never woke and now I'm livin a dream."
"Them hoes follow like twitter."
"Ni**as hate, they don't say it but they think it. When you lame I can't hear what you sayin when you speakin."
"Maybe one day, there can be "us" again, but if not fuck it then."
"Lifes good, So im livin great. call me outta town shawty, every week a different state."
"I don't have much but I take all I got and that's what I give, what I get in return is the money I earn and the life I live."
"Stay high like how Im supposed to do that crowd underneath them clouds cant get close to you."
"Got no money? Get some. You ain't got it? Go and get it."
"When niggas say I'm lucky, I say that..I'm blessed."
"They say the game done changed, theres just some new players in it, n they dont wanna see my team get up there n win it."
"It's lonely at the top, Im tired of having company."
"Plus my city on my back like its a mothafvckin last name."
"Got you ni**as checking game Im balling out on every level, hear them haters talk but theres nothing you can tell em."
"A lot of ni**as fake but me I give these hoes faith."
"I finally found me a cloud to float on."
"I aint gonna flex, Im not gonna front, you know if I ball, then we all gonna stunt."
"I aint trippin, never slicking or slacking on my pimping."
"They let me in the club fu*k a dress code. Me and my niggas rollin up the best smoke. OG kush from the west coast. Oh you down to fuck? Well shorty lets go."
"They call me Pocahontas doin' that rain dance, talkin' like oh I got it, borderline insane man."
"Grow some more weed and get medicated, everyday is a holiday so we celebrate it."
"I seen ni**as fold... like paper. Got money seen friends turn haters, got money minor league turn major, got money white people turn neighbors."
"Soon as I hit the club look at them hoes face, put the pedal once make the floor shake, suede inside, engine roaring its the big boy you know what I pay for it."
"Very strange yes.. you niggas too plane I'm a taylor gang jet."
"If the streets know anything about me, they know that imma ball. Different city every night, imma star."
"Went form being hated on to niggas try to go down the same road I made it on. Ain't no love lost but ain't no love shown, so now when niggas call I just don't pick up the phone."
"Send her my way, she ain't gotta hold up. Whenever you call baby I roll up."
"Real niggas fuk wit me so drama is not a thing."
"If I die today, remember me like Jimi Hendrix. Butt-ass nekkid covered in all bad bitches."
"Lotta money, lotta luggage, lotta hoes. When you in puttin work..that's how it goes."
"Stay away from the fake or phoney, ni**as who can't support their own."
"I only like to see the hoes who keep their nose up, have any nigga in the world but she chose us."
"Use to not be allowed in the building, but now we on the rooftop."
"Most niggas is broke, they bank is injured. Bitches gon ride with who they think's a winner, and I'll be smiling in case they take a picture."
"My cash change the forecast."
"Self made G, in my early twenties and own more money then oprah."
"Hoes treat me like I'm a king, they wanna live comfortably sippin on champagne."
"She say she love my cologne, that's money that you smell."
"You show to concerts lookin like a fan, I pull up in car service lookin like the man."
"Doin everything that you say I can't. Not a stroke of luck player you can say I plan."
"Them haters probably wonder when I'm gone stop, never! Most of it's been good but I've seen some bad weather."
"I'm so gone yes I burn after rollin' (after rollin') And float ooon an float oooon an float oon."
"If it's one thing I know it's smokin and livin large."
"I'm on my level."
"Beware of them ni**as wit tattoo sleeves."
"I'm gonna spend it all why wait for another day, I'ma take all this money I own and blow it all away."
"Find the baddest bitch and get her number I don't even call her, feel like a million dollars."
"Hating niggas talk, hear they whispers in the wind, but I don't wanna do them harm so I kill them with my pen."
"Doing everything that you say I can't, not a stroke of luck player you can stay I planned."
"Heard that you the shit, girl we should blow up together."
"Everybody smoking papers, nobody smoking blunts. Bitches rolling weed and my ni**as f-cked up yeaaaaaaaaa its a partyyyyyyyy, oh, its a party."
"Store running out of papers cause I bought em all. Niggas claiming that they Taylors but they not at all."
"Not a couple cameras now they bring the whole crew. Bad bitch ride wit me so she pose too."
"Victory I envision, so my mission is to win. One look at my arm she like wizzle where your skin?"
"I don't talk much, too many niggas hatin. By the boutique...that's my type of conversation."
"When they make it they should put my face up on a million dollar bill, cuz that's how I feel."
"Niggas acting mushy like cat food. Niggas acting pussy like cats do."
"Thousand pounds of weed. Riding in my car so fast I wont turn down the speed."
"Them hoes dont use they feet no more, they break down to their knees and suck me like a king."
"Nicky Santoro, money don't bend. Root of all evil, guess my bank is full of sin."
"No sweetener straight apple sauce. Doing movie roles, rapper slash actor dog."
"Tailor gang they rolling up those paper planes."
"Maserati look mean and its fast too. Cinderella bout to get that bitch some glass shoes."
"I was doing good way before I met you. Now you're off the set and I'mma let you see the show go on without you."
"Roll this up, after you hit it once, youll need a parachute."
"Ink my whole body, I don't give a motherfuck."
"Smoking 2 Ls, living large. See my watch and wanna know how much it really cost."
"Aint no love lost but aint no love shown, so now when niggas call I just dont pick up the phone."
"The money i get make a nigga rich and make a bitch nigga sit, make a hoe get on my dick, come to the crib and just strip."
"No Blackberry, too many lame niggas call my phone. Call me world wide Wiz cause Im never home."
"See Ive been going on and on for ever them haters probably wonder when Im gone stop, never!"
"Party every weekend, hardly ever home, dont see me face to face so you have to talk about me when I gone."
"Rose in my champagne glass and diamonds in my ring. Uh, roll some, thats your bitch on my dick, I might let her hold something."
"Big house, 4 whips, hella tattoos. Smoke good and ya bitch think Im bad news."
"Bout to go nuts, nigga, Cashews. A promoter asked me if Im booked I say Im past due."
"Not far from the tree thats where the apple falls. Say the wrong words so guys knock ya apple off."
"Little nigga, big money, big dreams. Tall nigga, small nigga, big team."
"Ooooh, girl your ass is superthick. Lotta chicks off in this club and you the baddest in this bitch."
"I can do what I what, went form being hated on to niggas try to go down the same road I made it on."
"Definition of cold: ice, 30 below champagne, foreign names in my pool."
"Take you home, let you sleep in my clothes, roll some weed the homies aint gotta know."
"When I was 16, finna get put out my home now the man making money, my nigga, my money growing."
"Yesterday's paper, that's why you old news. Hating on my team until they see we won't lose."
"Put a joint to my lips, and get highed up, skried up mean skied up, my niggas fried but dont try to run up on us."
"Can't deal with this relationship but this what you asked for ask for them pictures of them b*tches, shit I probably wouldn't be with them. If your ass wasn't trippin'."
"Girl I'm not a travel agent so what you trippin on."
"High as fuck, sloppy drunk when I'm passin' through. Rollin' doobies up, yo ho who we pass 'em to."
"Go download some of my old track and go play somewhere theres hoes at."
"Most of its been good but Ive seen some bad weather and niggas watching now, wouldnt even give me an umbrella."
"Bring the rap you was the main player I had to bench you. When I showed your ass how to ball that Louie I bought it all."
"Higher than hell flyer than Delta."
"Now how you think don't even speak unless you talkin franklins, ran out of weed but see i kept a g and brought a joint to bake so..."
"Homey used to be a player, now i coach fools on how to get your money, live it and spend it just how you're supposed to call some bitches to roll through."
"If you offer me all the money in the world I wouldn't trade it for my girl, my family, or the niggas that you see riding with me."
"Fuck a hater burn in hell, sipping champagne while the waiters break the shells."
"As we proceed, to court bad bitches and roll dope weed."
"You know what it is, everything I do, I do it big!"
"Leave a joint on the table smoke, i dont drink syrup im not maple, no your not able to hate on me, shit."
"How the fuck could you hate this? Half of these people lame real niggas shape shift. That's why I'm smoking OG til I'm weightless."
"I'm smoking on OG til til my problems gone, you try to call your man he ain't got no more probably cause I brought it all."
"So cool my bitch got no shoes my whip is new but i'm playin old school always keep it up to date that's why the hoes choose."
"As fuck my nigga, rep taylor gang whats up my nigga, big as a truck my nigga."
"Homey used to be a player, now i coach fools on how to get your money, live it and spend it just how you're supposed to call some bitches to roll through."
"Yesterday's paper, that's why you old news. Hating on my team until they see we won't lose."
"Little nigga, big money, big dreams. Tall nigga, small nigga, big team."
"Girl I'm not a travel agent so what you trippin on."
"Ooooh, girl your ass is superthick. Lotta chicks off in this club and you the baddest in this bitch."
"Roll this up, after you hit it once, youll need a parachute."
"Ink my whole body, I don't give a motherfuck."
"High as fuck, sloppy drunk when I'm passin' through. Rollin' doobies up, yo ho who we pass 'em to."
"How the fuck could you hate this? Half of these people lame real niggas shape shift. That's why I'm smoking OG til I'm weightless."
"Higher than hell flyer than Delta."
"If you offer me all the money in the world I wouldn't trade it for my girl, my family, or the niggas that you see riding with me."
"As we proceed, to court bad bitches and roll dope weed."
"I'm smoking on OG til til my problems gone, you try to call your man he ain't got no more probably cause I brought it all."
"Fuck a hater burn in hell, sipping champagne while the waiters break the shells."
"You know what it is, everything I do, I do it big!"
"Great Minds Think Alone"
